content.title: Rename Address Object in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Renames an existing address object by specifying the current name and the new desired name. Renaming is handled as a separate POST action using the :rename suffix and does not require a request body.

required_query_parameters.location: Defines the configuration scope such as shared or vsys.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required if location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: The current name of the address object.
required_query_parameters.newname: The new name to apply to the object.

common_errors: 403: Insufficient privileges or invalid API key
409: An object with the new name already exists
